channel.title: [PI] Issue with adding commands
channel.description:
I am trying to add in the ::home teleport command and possibly others. But i keep getting these errors. Any ideas on what i should do?
[code]src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:121 : error: illegal start of expr ession public void DonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:121 : error: illegal start of expr ession public void DonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:121 : error: ';' expected public void DonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:121 : error: ';' expected public void DonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:121 : error: not a statement public void DonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:121 : error: ';' expected public void DonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:127 : error: illegal start of expr ession public void HelperCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:127 : error: illegal start of expr ession public void HelperCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:127 : error: ';' expected public void HelperCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:127 : error: ';' expected public void HelperCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:127 : error: not a statement public void HelperCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:127 : error: ';' expected public void HelperCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:165 : error: 'try' without 'catch' , 'finally' or resource declarations try { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:178 : error: 'catch' without 'try'
catch(Exception e) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:178 : error: ')' expected catch(Exception e) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:178 : error: not a statement catch(Exception e) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:178 : error: ';' expected catch(Exception e) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:103 6: error: reached end of file while parsing }//DONT TOUCH THIS ^ 18 errors Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
My command.java:
http://pastebin.com/ZedBX7Bu

item.title: [PI] Issue with adding commands
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

tyb97:

Looks like a bracket issue to me, you have two choices. One, trace each bracket around the area that you added that command in, and make sure everything ends, and begins in order. Two, install an IDE program to promote better conventions and syntax, along with being able to easily avoid these issues. I would look at the class for you but due to the lack of any fudgeing indents what-so-ever you’re on your own.

Like Ty said, install an IDE, I would suggest JetBrains’s IntelliJ IDEA.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

you have an open brace on line 74

Read full topic

item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Looks like a bracket issue to me, you have two choices. One, trace each bracket around the area that you added that command in, and make sure everything ends, and begins in order. Two, install an IDE program to promote better conventions and syntax, along with being able to easily avoid these issues. I would look at the class for you but due to the lack of any fucking indents what-so-ever you’re on your own.
